article: the university of miami 's unk palmer eye institute has announced favorable results from a ##-week study , systemic avastin for unk age-related macular degeneration , that showed avastin substantially reduced the leakage from abnormal blood vessels in eyes of patients with unk -lrb- wet -rrb- age-related macular degeneration -lrb- amd -rrb- .
